member.name: F:ProductInfo.IdentityVersion
member.summary: This version used in code to identity product

member.name: T:Xafari.BC.Win.Controllers.XasStarterWindowController
member.summary: Intended to provide "Edit Configuration" action in the "Tools" menu.
member.remarks: The action runs the XAS application if available. The XAS application must exist by the path and the current user must have administrator's rights (in case when security system is used).

member.name: M:Xafari.BC.Win.Controllers.XasStarterWindowController.IsAppConfiguratorUser
member.summary: Indicating whether the current user to run the XAS application.

member.name: P:Xafari.BC.Win.Controllers.XasStarterWindowController.EditConfigurationAction
member.summary: Provides access to the 's Edit Configuration Action.

member.name: P:Xafari.BC.Win.Controllers.XasStarterWindowController.XasToolPath
member.summary: Path to the XAS application (including executable name).

member.name: T:Xafari.BC.Win.Editors.ModelNodesLookupPropertyEditor
member.summary: Property editor is intended for reference properties of classes that implement interface. This is mainly classes inherited from ServiceCfgObject{T, TModel} class (so calles ModelNodeWrappers).
member.remarks: Property name of ModelNodeWrapper class has to be the same as appropriate model node name (each property of ModelNodeWrapper is mapped to appropriate property of the model). The property editor uses attributes (, ) of matched model node to fill lookup collection.

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.
